name: Fausts Alptraum
description: Fausts Alptraum is an single player, puzzle game created by LabORat Studio, an indie game team from Taiwan. The story based on Goethe's Faust. Players will play as a troubled girl wandering around in a crayon-drawn world. Players will have to find the relevance between dreams and reality by collecting clues.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Celeron Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1024x768 High Color + DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 512 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Celeron Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1024x768 High Color + DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 512 MB available space
